name: In The Gym (Memes Horror Game)
description:
Indie horror with an emphasis on the unique ♂️atmosphere. The gameplay is very simple, you are in a big gym ♂️and now you have to find 10 amazing anime pictures hidden here. Find all the pictures before the local boys ♂️ find you. In The Gym does not offer you a huge open world, a complex leveling system, loot boxes and other must-have elements of most modern games. No, after the purchase, you will only have 10 minutes of intense ♂️ searching for anime pictures. But what else do you need!?

Game Features

♂️ Addictive Gameplay

♂️ Atmospheric Location

♂️ 10 Anime Pictures

♂️ Memes


BONUS LEVEL - "THE BACKROOMS"
